CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Others_Sub_Status_Selected__c) || ISBLANK(Others_Sub_Status_Ended__c)) && (Others_Sub_Status_Ended__c - Others_Sub_Status_Selected__c) >0, ROUND((Others_Sub_Status_Ended__c - Others_Sub_Status_Selected__c)*24,2), IF (NOT(ISBLANK(Others_Sub_Status_Selected__c)),ROUND(( Now()-Others_Sub_Status_Selected__c ) * 24, 2), Null))
CustomField.label: Time in Other Sub-Status
